articles.description: IDFC First Bank’s loan growth remained flattish in Q2, owing to rebalancing of portfolio, but long-term prospects remain intact.

articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.title: BMW X3 M mid-size Sports Activity Vehicle launched in India -Check price, specs - Zee News
articles.description: BMW India on Monday launched the first-ever M car by rolling out the mid-size Sports Activity Vehicle (SAV) --BMW X3 M today. The first-ever BMW X3 M is available in Donington Grey, Toronto Red, Phytonic Blue, Sophisto Grey, Black Sapphire   Alpine White.
articles.content:
New Delhi: BMW India on Monday launched the first-ever M car by rolling out the mid-size Sports Activity Vehicle (SAV) --BMW X3 M today.

articles.author: Lijee Philip, ET Auto
articles.title: Harley’s ride with Hero may leave its dealers in the lurch - ETAuto.com
articles.description: Dealers point to the mid-sized bike Street, which accounted for 70-90% of sales in upcountry and metro markets and has been out of production for more than a month.
articles.content:
Many dealers had expanded and refurbished their showrooms as Harley-Davidson had firmed up plans to increase volumes for the Street and newer mid-sized motorcycles.

articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.title: Equitas Small Finance Bank lists at 6% discount to issue price - Economic Times
articles.description: The IPO, which was sold between October 20 and 22, was subscribed 1.95 times in the three-day bidding process, much less compared with the issues that hit the market prior to it. The HNI quota of shares in the IPO remained undersubscribed at 22 per cent.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: Shares of Equitas Small Finance Bank made a tepid debut in Mumbai trading on Monday, as the scrip got listed at Rs 31, a 6.06 per cent discount to its issue price of Rs 33. 
The IPO, whic… [+1290 chars]

articles.description: The Maruti Suzuki Swift has been one of the best-selling hatchbacks in the country for ages now, and the Hyundai Grand i10 seems to be the only car that comes close
